EmailTemplate.name: 10-21-21 HOS TECHFEST Retraction.TECHFEST Email Retraction
EmailTemplate.subject: CORRECTION: 2021 TechFest Invitation
EmailTemplate.textOnly: This morning, you were mistakenly included on an email invitation to an NCR employee event. We’re sorry for any confusion this has caused. If you have registered to attend the TechFest event from the previous email, we will follow up with you on other opportunities that will be available to you in November and December to learn more about upcoming new features and products. Thank you for your understanding. Your NCR Team P.S. Our team is always working to be better and we’d love to hear any ideas about how we can improve. Feel free to reply to this email or drop us a line at marketing.hospitality@ncr.com <[[mailto:marketing.hospitality@ncr.com]]> any time. <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
